td.content: s:a male aged 30 Ys presents with severe blurry and double vision, severe clouded, blurred vision in right eye and severe cloudiness in both eyes. These symptoms are present for about 11 days. Denies ever using tobacco describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in his past o:Height 74 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:a white M aged 30 yrs indicates severe clouded, blurred vision in right eye, severe cloudiness in both eyes, severe blurry and double vision and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. o:Height 73 in, Weight 115 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Intracapsular cataract extraction (ICCE) - eye.
